entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
